definition: to take care/to look out
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: So watch out for these tests because they happen all the time。
sentences.chinese: 所以，要當心這些測試，因爲它們無時不在。

sentences.english: He always borrows money from others but the repayment is on the Greek calends .
sentences.chinese: 當心那傢伙，他總是找別人借錢，但是從不還錢。

sentences.english: Also the limited-time offers, which make you feel like you have to take advantage of a special deal.
sentences.chinese: 也要當心限時優惠，這會讓你感到佔了便宜。

sentences.english: Mind how you carry that pot; you'll spill some of the water out.
sentences.chinese: 端那隻鍋的時候當心一點，不然會把水潑出來的。

sentences.english: There are a lot of false dragon card , the purchase must be careful.
sentences.chinese: 現在有很多假龍牌，購買時一定當心。

sentences.english: Be careful, there still is a snake in brushwood.
sentences.chinese: 當心，草叢中還藏着一條蛇呢。

sentences.english: Beware of sale items, which make you feel like you must buy.
sentences.chinese: 當心促銷品，因爲它們會讓你感到自己不能不買。

sentences.english: Be careful how these modules communicate with each other.
sentences.chinese: 要當心這些模塊彼此之間如何通信。

sentences.english: First, I remind myself of the phenomenon of unconscious over-claiming;
sentences.chinese: 第一，我提醒自己當心下意識的要求過高現象。

sentences.english: A:Fetch me that diamond necklace,or Heaven have mercy on your lones.
sentences.chinese: 把那條鑽研項鍊拿給我，否則當心你的骨頭。

sentences.english: When the fox preaches, then take care of your geese.
sentences.chinese: 每當狐狸說教，當心鵝羣被盜。

sentences.english: Be careful , the paint may smear .
Her comes a candle to light you to bed, Here comes a chopper to chop off your head.
sentences.chinese: 蠟燭點燃時你該上牀睡覺去，當心刀斧要你的命。

sentences.english: Shirley stars push xiao LAN to one side, and charged her be careful.
sentences.chinese: 厲星晨將蕭嵐推到一邊，囑咐她當心。

sentences.english: Waiter:Here is your steak, please be careful of the hot plate. Enjoy your dinner.
sentences.chinese: 這是您的牛排，請當心鐵盤燙，祝您用餐愉快。

sentences.english: Comrade, I wish you bon voyage, be careful in the midnight cold north wind.
sentences.chinese: 戰友，祝你一路平安，當心夜半北風寒。
